raw_description: Users say they can't log in sometimes. Please look into it.

acceptance_criteria: Given a user with valid credentials, When they enter email/password and click Login, Then they are redirected to dashboard within 3s
Given a user with invalid password, When they attempt login, Then they see 'Invalid credentials' error
Given a user with unverified email, When they attempt login, Then they are prompted to verify email
success_metrics: P1 incidents related to login = 0 in 30 days

raw_description: We need dark mode for the app. Make it switchable.

acceptance_criteria: Given user opens Settings, When they toggle 'Dark Mode', Then UI updates instantly
Given user enables dark mode, When they reload page, Then preference is remembered
Given system theme is dark, When 'Follow system' is enabled, Then app uses dark mode
edge_cases: Partial theme support in old browsers
success_metrics: ≥30% of active users enable dark mode within 7 days of launch

raw_description: Dashboard is slow. Make it faster.

accept_criteria: Given user logs in, When dashboard loads, Then all widgets render in <4s (P95)
Given 10+ widgets enabled, When user scrolls, Then no jank (>16ms frame time)

raw_description: When I click export, nothing happens.

acceptance_criteria: Given user is on Reports page with data, When they click 'Export CSV', Then file downloads within 2s
Given >10k rows, When export is triggered, Then progress indicator shows and file completes in <30s

raw_description: Let users change their name and photo.

acceptance_criteria: Given user in Profile, When they edit name and save, Then name updates in DB and UI
Given user uploads JPG/PNG <5MB, When they save, Then avatar updates across app
success_metrics: ≥80% of users update profile within 30 days of signup

raw_description: Need to search the list of items.

acceptance_criteria: Given table with >100 rows, When user types in search, Then results filter in <300ms
Given user searches 'invoice 2025', Then all matching rows in any column appear
success_metrics: Search used in ≥50% of sessions with >50 rows

acceptance_criteria: Given event triggers email (e.g. mention), When job runs, Then email is sent via SES
Given user has notifications enabled, When event occurs, Then they receive email <60s later

raw_description: On phone, menu stays open after tap.

acceptance_criteria: Given mobile viewport, When user taps menu icon, Then menu opens
Given menu is open, When user taps outside or item, Then menu closes

raw_description: Errors are confusing. Make them better.

acceptance_criteria: Given API returns 500, When frontend shows error, Then message is user-friendly with error ID
Given form validation fails, When user submits, Then field-level errors appear inline

raw_description: List is too long. Add pages.

acceptance_criteria: Given >50 items, When page loads, Then shows 25 per page with controls
Given user clicks page 3, Then URL updates and correct items load
success_metrics: Avg time on list page <10s for >100 items
